page.title: 06HALLMARK LTD.,DUNN CONVEYORS
page.content:
{ HALLMARK (Tractors) Ltd.. } { -------------------------}
The firm sells and repairs agricultural machinery and it has 42 employees.The company is privately owned and started in 1963. It was begun by the Hall & Clay families.
{DUNN CONVEYORS} {--------------
This firm is a family company and it repairs and makes conveyors.The building was constructed in 1975 after moving from Tamworth.The firm exports goods to Spain,Belguim and Singapore.In Great Britain they supply to Schweppes, Heinz and the National Coal Board.
